QuestData.Title: The Kodo's Return
QuestData.Description: The great beast rises slowly to its feet, the loose Barrens soil spilling from its revitalized limbs. Instinctively it trudges back toward its home at Grol'dom Farm.$B$BYou'll want to check in with Kranal Fiss to make sure the kodo made it.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Kranal Fiss at Grol'dom Farm to ensure that his missing kodo arrived safely.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Kranal Fiss at Grol'dom Farm in Northern Barrens to ensure that his missing kodo arrived safely.
QuestData.RewardText: So that was your handiwork, $r? Yes, the missing Kodo arrived just minutes ago. It will take many nights to nurse the poor beast's wounds, but thanks to you it's alive. And you saved a whole shipment!$B$BPlease, take your pick of the gear that the kodo was carrying.
